evidence.claim: The company emphasizes its commitment to HIPAA compliance for handling sensitive patient information.
Wealthy White Coat integrates with various EHR systems as part of its health-tech solutions.
The company is actively hiring for engineering positions which may involve building upon cloud services.
The website mentions a focus on data interoperability, suggesting adherence to standards like FHIR.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transactions or API automation use cases found.
